## isVoid() function

判断是否是空值，空值包括null、undefined、NaN

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isVoid(t: any): t is null | undefined;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  t | any |  |

**Returns:**

t is null \| undefined
